requirements: After MATH 120 or equivalent; after or concurrently with MATH 222 or 225 or equivalent.
description:
First-order equations, second-order equations, linear systems with constant coefficients. Numerical solution methods. Geometric and algebraic properties of differential equations.
After MATH 120 or equivalent; after or concurrently with MATH 222 or 225 or equivalent.
title: Ordinary Differential Equations
